OOC: Sorry.

BIC:  Upon realizing Maximal city had gone up in smoke TT sent out 
another message.

TT:  ARE ANY MAXIMALS LEFT AROUND HERE!  I NEED TO FIND ANOTHER 
MAXIMAL BASE!  WE ARE ALL IN EXTREME DANGER!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> OOC: I haven't decided on all his brothers details yet, but let's 
just 
> say he's a copycat when it comes to his plan and is probably the 
> leader of the operation (and probably knew Beast Wars Megatron).
> 
> BIC: He sends out a message.
> 
> TT:  This is former Maximal unit Turntail.  This is an emergency.  I 
> need help.  I can't explain right now just let down the shields.
> 
> He runs for the city.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> > {Panthos}
> > 
> >     The panther stopped sitting gack lifting a paw to indicate 
> Maximal City just ahead, "Here's where we part company. While I 
trust 
> my reflexes to dodge your fire, computer operated turrets are beyond 
> even my skills and it will be embarrassing enough seeking a cr 
chamber 
> for the minor damage you've caused me let alone dragging myself to 
one 
> after being targetted by them."
> > 
> >     Smirking lightly he turned moving off away from the Maximal 
City 
> and Turntail. "Sounds like an interesting fellow your brother. I'll 
> keep my ears open and if I find someone matching his discription 
I'll 
> be sure to let you know..."
> > 
> > (OOC...)
> > 
> >     Name could change I suppose though it's not odd to have a name 
> completely seperate from your beast mode...
> > 
> >   TT: Who knows what he's called now. But he looks just like me if 
> that 
> >   helps you.  And believe me he's done things that make the great 
> wars 
> >   look like a battle with squirt guns.  Things Megatron himself 
> wouldn't 
> >   do without a MUCH better reason than he had.
> > 
> >   OOC:  Don't bots usually change there names depending on there 
> Beast 
> >   Modes?
> > 
> >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> >   > TT: remember that, and DON'T mention it again.
> >   > 
> >   > {Panthos}
> >   > 
> >   >     The panther turned his head looking back at the maximal 
and 
> >   shrugged, "Maybe he's undercover. Sounds like something a 
maximal 
> >   would do to infiltrate a predacon group. Do something slightly 
> evil 
> >   and against your original nature, get sent to prison and get 
> busted 
> >   out for your knowledge."
> >   > 
> >   >     Shaking his head, "Then again maybe he really did turn to 
> our 
> >   side. Oh well I'll be sure to look him up if he's about. What's 
> his 
> >   name?"
> >
